project.name: geotools-epsg-access
project.shortDescription: EPSG Authoriy Service using MS-Access database
project.description: Connection to EPSG database in MS-Access format. This is the primary format released by EPSG, so it should be understood as the most "official" one. This plugin is very short and contains nothing else than connection parameters. The user must install himself the EPSG database on his machine.

developer.name: Martin Desruisseaux
